product_overview: Adham AgriTech is a comprehensive smart agriculture platform designed to empower Egyptian farmers and agricultural stakeholders with AI-powered insights, satellite imagery analysis, precision irrigation recommendations, and robust farm and field management tools to optimize crop yields, reduce resource waste, and improve profitability.
core_goals: Enable efficient management of multiple farms and fields with precise boundary and crop tracking.
Provide real-time crop health monitoring and analytics using satellite imagery and advanced vegetation indices.
Leverage multi-provider AI for plant disease diagnosis and intelligent agricultural advice.
Deliver comprehensive soil health analysis with dynamic recommendations.
Optimize irrigation practices through AI-driven scheduling integrating soil moisture and weather data.
Implement an early warning system for vegetation stress, drought, disease, and temperature risks.
Predict crop yields accurately with confidence scores and harvest date estimation.
Integrate detailed weather data to support agricultural planning and alerts.
Facilitate crop monitoring through timeline views and health scoring over growth stages.
Generate detailed reports and analytics to support data-driven farming decisions.
key_features: Farm and Field Management with polygon boundary drawing, crop and soil type tracking, and area validation.
Real-time Satellite Imagery & Analytics layers including NDVI, EVI, NDMI, chlorophyll, and moisture mapped interactively on 3D terrain.
AI-Powered Assistant offering multi-provider AI support, plant disease image analysis, and conversational interface.
Comprehensive Soil Analysis covering NPK, pH, moisture, organic content, and tailored fertilization recommendations.
Irrigation Management powered by AI integrating soil and weather data for optimal watering schedules.
Early Warning System issuing automated alerts for agricultural risks with severity assessment.
AI-based Yield Prediction utilizing historical and real-time data for production forecasts.
Weather Integration with current conditions, forecasts, and alerts linked to other farming modules.
Crop Monitoring with timeline views, health trend tracking, and growth stage identification.
Reports & Analytics offering exportable comprehensive insights on farm performance and resource use.
user_flow_summary: New User Onboarding: Sign up, create farm, add fields, fetch satellite data, view analytics dashboard.
Daily Usage: Login, overview of field health, check alerts, review irrigation recommendations, upload plant images for diagnosis, and view detailed analytics.
Field Management: Navigate to fields, view all field health scores, inspect satellite and soil analytics, review irrigation plans.
Disease Diagnosis: Access AI assistant, upload plant images, receive analysis and treatment advice, save results.
Early Warning & Alerts: Monitor dashboard for risk alerts and follow recommended actions.
Yield Planning: Utilize yield predictions and harvest estimates for planning and decision-making.
validation_criteria: Successful user registration, login, and session management with Supabase Auth.
Accurate farm and field creation with polygon boundary validation not exceeding farm area by 50%.
Real-time fetching and rendering of satellite imagery layers with EOSDA API fallback support.
Multi-provider AI integrations functioning with plant disease image analysis and conversational capabilities.
Correct dynamic soil parameter analysis and corresponding recommendations.
Irrigation recommendations consistent with soil moisture and weather data inputs.
Automated early warning generation upon risk detection with proper alert display.
Reliable crop yield prediction with confidence scoring and harvest date estimation.
Weather data accurately integrated and reflected in the user interface with forecast and alerts.
Responsive, error-handled UI supporting multi-language (Arabic and English) with accessibility considerations.
